leve.name: Pommeling the Enemy (L)
leve.description: In the past, our robust trade with the inhabitants of Sharlayan provided us with copious amounts of pommel ore. Following the scholars' exodus, the fountain of metal from their miners has since run dry and we must now secure our own veins in their abandoned home. Search the area around the Daggers and with luck, you may find one of the lost lodes.
leve.client: Temple Knights Second Commander Ser Handeloup
